text:
="preserve">Universal design is a design of any products and informations that every person can use, of all ages, genders, disabilities.
The principle of universal design is to be simple, and easy to accesse to any public institutions and informations. It also include the useful information technology and Internet. This concept is also uesd in the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities as a condition of the common human rights.

annotations.surface_form: Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities
